column4: when I dial in to internet, many times modem starts downloading, I believe its "update" something!  How can I stop it doing this automatically?
cafuego: when I dial in to internet, many times modem starts downloading, I believe its "update" something!  How can I stop it doing this automatically?
does anyone know how to turn off auto update?
I dont see  System | Software Properties
I only have  System | prefernces and  System | Administation
I dont see Internet Updates ANYWHERE! im using Breezy
System | Administration | Update Manager | Preferences | Settings
hi :) does anyone know how to turn off auto update?
ok I unticked auto update :)  So now I need to type apt-get update regularly, correct?
yes, you have to manually update and upgrade
